footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Sayu | Update Date: 10/24/2022 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Wolf's Gravestone, Skyward Pride, Sacrificial Greatsword, Katsuragikiri Nagamasa, Luxurious Sea-Lord, Rainslasher, Bloodtainted Greatsword

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery|<goblet>  Elemental Mastery|<circlet>  Elemental Mastery or Healing Bonus

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Yoohoo Art - Mujina Flurry
**2)** Elemental Skill: Yoohoo Art - Fuuin Dash
Normal Attack and Skill level does not increase the amount of healing Sayu does.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
__Dendro Support Sayu__
4-set of Deepwood Memories and Forest Regalia work in addition to options stated above. 

Try keep a balance between Sayu's Attack and Elemental Mastery while keeping Energy Recharge decently high. After C6, it becomes ideal to focus on Elemental Mastery only. If you run an ATK% weapon like the Luxurious Sea-Lord or Energy Recharge weapon like Favonius Greatsword, it is recommended to run an Elemental Mastery focused set and vise versa.
